snippet: Iran’s official news agency, the Islamic Republic News Agency, said authorities had barred the coach of the national team, Carlos Queiroz, from leaving the country over unpaid taxes.
abstract: Iran's national soccer coach Carlos Queiroz is reportedly barred from leaving country over unpaid taxes.
lead_paragraph: Iran’s official news agency, the Islamic Republic News Agency, said authorities had barred the coach of the national team, Carlos Queiroz, from leaving the country over unpaid taxes.
